resources.string: GCIT Zakhang Tsi-Deb is app-base system managing the credit account book in Gyalposhing college canteen. It will offer the user (customers) to check/view the total amount and the amount made in the particular date through Gmail notification send by canteen owner (Admin). The customer gets notified on any updates made in individuals account without time consuming, making it more effective, convenient and easy to manage and use. It ease in maintaining the credit account for both admin and user and build transparency in between them.
